snippet: Emilio Pucci will not confirm or deny that Peter Dundas is leaving, the kind of comment that keeps turning up recently and draws everyone's attention from the clothes.
abstract: Emilio Pucci's refusal to confirm or deny whether artistic director Peter Dundas is leaving brand after Milan Fashion Week show, despite strong hints to the affirmative, is emblematic of increasing ambiguity surrounding such transactions, which often draws attention from clothes themselves.
lead_paragraph: Emilio Pucci will not confirm or deny that Peter Dundas is leaving, the kind of comment that keeps turning up recently and draws everyone's attention from the clothes.

headline.main: When Fashion Gossip Becomes an Accessory
headline.print_headline: There’s Nothing Bad in Saying Goodbye
